location: Greater Santiago, Santiago Metropolitan Region, Chile
introduction_text: My career is characterized by a constant search for innovation and improvement through training. I hold technical degrees from Vanderbilt (Prompt Engineering) and Yale (Financial Markets), a Bachelor of Science (UEP. Humboldt School), and training in key digital marketing and project management areas. Expert in technological leveraging to boost results.
exp1_desc_1: Led front desk and sales floor operations, ensuring exceptional customer experiences.
exp1_desc_2: Optimized key operational processes, including inventory and order management, and logistics reporting, using prompt engineering to increase efficiency.
exp1_desc_3: Developed and implemented B2B/B2C digital acquisition strategies, leveraging language models (LLMs) to enhance effectiveness.
exp1_desc_4: Managed resolution of customer incidents and complaints (in-person/remote), strengthening relationships and loyalty.
exp1_desc_5: Contributed to improving the shopping experience by optimizing product presentation and sales floor functionality.
exp2_desc_1: Customer service via phone and social media.
exp2_desc_2: Entry of commercial and technical claims.
exp2_desc_3: Entry of service requests as appropriate.
exp2_desc_4: Data entry of requirements in ERP.
exp2_desc_6: Entry and management of commercial claims and objections.
exp2_desc_8: Management of field installations and repairs.
exp2_desc_10: Retention of clients requesting service cancellation.

cover_letter_p1: As an AI Agent Developer and Prompt Engineer, I have postgraduate technical training from Vanderbilt University in Prompt Engineering and AI Agent Development. Additionally, I have training in Financial Markets from Yale University and hold a Bachelor of Science from UEP. Colegio Humboldt. My diverse background in areas such as SEO and content marketing, online marketing plan creation, B2B marketing, Google Analytics, and project management fundamentals allows me to leverage technology to enhance effectiveness and efficiency.
cover_letter_p2: During my time as Front Desk Manager at Ferretería Calle Calle, I led front desk and sales floor operations, ensuring exceptional customer experiences. I optimized key operational processes using prompt engineering to increase efficiency and implemented B2B/B2C digital acquisition strategies, leveraging language models (LLMs) to improve effectiveness. I also managed the resolution of customer incidents and complaints, strengthening relationships and loyalty, and contributed to enhancing the shopping experience.
cover_letter_p3: Previously, as a Commercial Advisor at Telsur Chile, I provided customer service via phone and social media, managed commercial and technical claims, offered advice, and participated in sales and contracting.
cover_letter_p4: I am excited to apply my skills and experience in a dynamic environment. I appreciate your time and consideration in reading this far. I have created this humble yet informative website for your easy review and hope to have the opportunity to demonstrate my performance and contribute with you by applying all my skills.
